title: Bug splat and queue
body: Recently, I have entered champ select in ranked solo and duo queue and when my banning time started I happened to come across a bug splat that exited my game. I have never experienced bug splat on this computer before, as a result of getting this I was subjected to losing 3 LP and gaining a queue delay. I don't think it's fair that i should lose this LP putting into account that I'm 99 percent sure it isn't my side of the spectrum. Further more I feel that if other people experiencing this problem they should not be inclined to this punishment.

replies.body: I get this problem as well sometimes. I am pretty sure it is the new client so I am reverting mine to legacy.

Regardless of the reason for the disconnection, your absence still negatively impacts *everyone in the match*. This is a big reason as to why the system treats all disconnections equally and why we cannot remove penalties for any reason.

Bugsplats indicate that there's an issue with either your system drivers or your system hardware. To ensure this cannot be easily resolved with some common solutions, I recommend working through our [**Bugsplat Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes). Please let me know if those steps resolved your issue.
